title: How do you license for this usage?
content:
\*\*Instructions\*\*

1. GO TO [http://www.tatuagemdaboa.com.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015000219/http:/www.tatuagemdaboa.com.br/ "http://www.tatuagemdaboa.com.br")

2. TYPE YOUR FIRST NAME ON THE 1st LINE.

3. TYPE YOUR LAST NAME ON THE 2nd LINE.

4. Skip your e.mail address.

5. Click on vizualizar and watch what happens!.

comments.content: I bet a certain former New York governor could advise.

Wow! That is good. I guess if that spreads out to the type founders around the globe, many guys will make a 2nd mortgage on the house just to buy fonts!

-Andre
